name: Lyra (Lyra Game Studio)
description:
Lyra has awaken in the middle of a forest, and the deities of that strange place don't look willing to let her go.

Lyra is a short Boss Rush game designed and developed by Oscar de las Heras and Xavier Farré. Feel free to post your feedback, it is very welcomed!

Keyboard controls:
Movement: WASD
Attack: K
Dash: Spacebar
Recall: L
Interact: E
Pause: P
